verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> at the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G1137>corners<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2902>holding<s%> <S%G2902>back<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> should <S%G4154>blow<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> on <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1186>tree.<s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G305>ascending<s%> from the <S%G395>rising<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> and he <S%G2896>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> to the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> it was <S%G1325>granted<s%> to <S%G91>harm<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Do not <S%G91>harm<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> the <S%G1186>trees,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> we have <S%G4972>sealed<s%> the bond-servants of our <S%G2316>God<s%> on their <S%G3359>foreheads.<s%>"

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4972>sealed,<s%> <S%G1540>one<s%> <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and forty-four <S%G5505>thousand<s%> <S%G4972>sealed<s%> from <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of Israel: <S%G2474><s%>

from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2455>Judah,<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> [were] <S%G4972>sealed,<s%> from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G4502>Reuben<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G1045>Gad<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%>

from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G768>Asher<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3508>Naphtali<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3128>Manasseh<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%>

from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G3017>Levi<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G7096>Issachar<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%>

from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand,<s%> from the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin,<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> [were] <S%G4972>sealed.<s%>

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I <S%G3708>looked,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G705>count,<s%> from <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> and [all] <S%G5443>tribes<s%> and <S%G2992>peoples<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> and <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robes,<s%> and <S%G5404>palm<s%> <S%G5404>branches<s%> [were] in their <S%G5495>hands;<s%>

and they <S%G2896>cry<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4991>"Salvation<s%> to our <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and to the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>"

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G2945>around<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> and [around] the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>living<s%> <S%G2226>creatures;<s%> and they <S%G4098>fell<s%> on their <S%G4383>faces<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G281>"Amen,<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G2479>might,<s%> [be] to our <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>"

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to me, <S%G3778>"These<s%> who are <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in the <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G4749>robes,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> are they, and from <S%G4159>where<s%> have they <S%G2064>come<s%>?"

And I <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "My <S%G2962>lord,<s%> you <S%G3609>know.<s%>" And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G3778>"These<s%> are the ones who <S%G2064>come<s%> out of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> and they have <S%G4150>washed<s%> their <S%G4749>robes<s%> and <S%G3021>made<s%> them <S%G3021>white<s%> in the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason,<s%> they are <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and they <S%G3000>serve<s%> Him <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night<s%> in His <S%G3485>temple;<s%> and He who <S%G2521>sits<s%> on the <S%G2362>throne<s%> shall <S%G4637>spread<s%> His <S%G4637>tabernacle<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them.

for the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> in the <S%G3319>center<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> shall be their <S%G4165>shepherd,<s%> and shall <S%G3594>guide<s%> them to <S%G4077>springs<s%> of the <S%G5204>water<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G1813>wipe<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1144>tear<s%> from their <S%G3788>eyes.<s%> "
